title: Rural Municipality of Leroy No. 339
text:
The Rural Municipality of Leroy No. 339 (<a href="Canada%202016%20Census">2016 population</a>: ) is a <a href="List%20of%20rural%20municipalities%20in%20Saskatchewan">rural municipality</a> (RM) in the <a href="Provinces%20and%20territories%20of%20Canada">Canadian province</a> of <a href="Saskatchewan">Saskatchewan</a> within <a href="Division%20No.%2010%2C%20Saskatchewan">Census Division No. 10</a> and <a href="SARM%20Division%20No.%205">Division No. 5</a>. It is located east of <a href="Saskatoon">Saskatoon</a>.
History.
The RM of Roach No. 339 was originally incorporated as a rural municipality on January 1, 1913. Its name was changed to the RM of Ayr No. 339 on March 14, 1914 and then renamed again to the RM of Leroy No. 339 on February 27, 1931.
Geography.
Communities and localities.
The following <a href="List%20of%20municipalities%20in%20Saskatchewan%23Urban%20municipalities">urban municipalities</a> are surrounded by the RM.
The following unincorporated communities are within the RM.
Demographics.
In the <a href="2016%20Canadian%20Census">2016 Census of Population</a> conducted by <a href="Statistics%20Canada">Statistics Canada</a>, the RM of Leroy No. 339 recorded a population of living in of its total private dwellings, a change from its 2011 population of . With a land area of , it had a population density of in 2016.
In the <a href="2011%20Canadian%20Census">2011 Census of Population</a>, the RM of Leroy No. 339 recorded a population of , a change from its 2006 population of . With a land area of , it had a population density of in 2011.
Government.
The RM of Leroy No. 339 is governed by an elected municipal council and an appointed administrator that meets on the second Wednesday of every month. The <a href="Reeve%20%28Canada%29">reeve</a> of the RM is Calvin Buhs while its administrator is Wendy Gowda. The RM's office is located in Leroy.
